com.bandyer.core_av.capturer.audio

Interface BaseCapturerAudioInterface<T extends Capturer>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    CapturerAudio, CapturerAudioVideo, CapturerAudioVideoCamera, CapturerAudioVideoScreen

    public BaseCapturerAudioInterface<T extends Capturer>

    Audio capturer interface

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isAudioEnabled()
      Used to indicate if audio is enabled or not.
      void setAudioEnabled(boolean enabled)
      Method to enable/disable the audio

    • Method Detail

      • isAudioEnabled

        boolean isAudioEnabled()

        Used to indicate if audio is enabled or not.

        By default is set to true

      • setAudioEnabled

        Method to enable/disable the audio

        Parameters:
        enabled - true to enable,false otherwise
